definition: to get on a horse/to mount
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Cao Xiu donned his armor and rode into the city with 1, 000 men to stop the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 休急披掛上馬，引千餘人在城中拒敵。

sentences.english: Lift him on the horse, Scarlett, and face his head toward its tail.
sentences.chinese: 史考烈特，將他擡上馬，頭面對着尾巴。

sentences.english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple .
sentences.chinese: 他跳上馬，朝寺廟方向飛奔而去。

sentences.english: He caught a kelpie, and tied her behind him on his horse.
sentences.chinese: 他抓來一隻水精，把她拉上馬，綁在自己的身後。

sentences.english: The project will start next year.
He saddled the horse and rode off with all speed.
sentences.chinese: 他給馬套上鞍子，騎上馬全速奔去。

sentences.english: Harry rode on a horse to purse him.
Miss Chenery, I risk my life every time I climb on a horse.
sentences.chinese: 切納利蜜斯，每次我一上馬就是在拿我的生命冒險。

sentences.english: Three Gorges Project is the inevitable result of lacking transparency in policies and media.
sentences.chinese: 三峽工程上馬是政策不透明，媒體不開放的必然產物。

sentences.english: They jumped on to their horses and dashed away.
Top with the mozzarella cheese and the remaining Parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 表面撒上馬蘇裏拉奶酪和帕爾瑪乾酪。

sentences.english: Every night he rises from his burial place, jumps on his horse and rides through the valley looking for his lost head.
sentences.chinese: 每晚他都從墳墓中走出來，騎上馬去尋找他的頭顱。

sentences.english: Under such a circumstance I would give a flat denial, and ride off as fast as I could.
sentences.chinese: 遇到這種事，我會爽爽快快地謝絕，騎上馬就走。

sentences.english: Then we got on some horses, and rode away through the night.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們騎上馬，連夜騎馬離開。

sentences.english: Mum asked all the riders to mount up and follow Emily.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽告訴所有的騎士騎上馬跟着艾米莉。

sentences.english: In 2003 Wu Han iron & steel company constructs the Entity Producing & Selling Information System.
sentences.chinese: 2003年武鋼上馬了整體產銷資訊系統。

definition: careless/reckless/casually/absent-mindedly/at will/at random/any old how
to damn/to curse/to revile
all of a sudden/hurriedly
to continue/to replenish
to leave a place where some event is taking place/(of an actor) to exit/(sports) to leave the field/(of an audience) to leave
to dismount from a horse/(fig.) to abandon (a project)
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to bill/to open a tab
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
to pursue/to chase after/to accelerate/to catch up with/to overtake
to brace oneself to do sth/to put a bold face on it/to summon up courage/to force oneself to
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
startled
technical/technological
stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
in disguised form/covert
